resources.string: We are trying to intercept as many hardware keys as possible, but it roughly depends on your hardware/software.
Please select folder containing game data files:
No Stratagus data files were found in

Stratagus is a real-time strategy gaming engine. You can play several games based on it.
\ * Wargus - Warcraft II: Tides of Darkness & Beyond the Dark Portal (expansion pack) clone, which uses content from original Blizzard games CDs.
\ * Stargus - partial Starcraft I clone, also uses content from original CD.
\ You will need to provide 'game data files' to actually play anything, for help on creating data, please visit - http://stratagus.drodin.com
